name: Witchy Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner enchantress! Conjure up the perfect witchy name with our mystical generator. Perfect for your next RPG character, story, or just for fun!
introduction: Feeling a little…magical? Ready to embrace your inner witch? Then you've come to the right place! Our Witchy Name Generator is here to help you brew up a name that's as captivating and unique as you are. Whether you're writing a fantasy novel, creating a character for a tabletop game, or simply looking for a cool nickname, we've got you covered. Get ready to discover your bewitching alter ego!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold the magic!
Don't like the first result? Keep clicking! We've got a cauldron full of possibilities.
Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own custom witchy name.
Share your favorite names with your coven (aka your friends)!

faqs.question: Is this generator really magical?
faqs.answer: Well, we can't *guarantee* actual magic, but we've poured a whole lot of creative energy into it! The results are pretty enchanting, if we do say so ourselves.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Consider these names royalty-free and ready for your next big project. Just don't blame us if your book becomes a bestseller!

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! There's no limit to the magic you can create.

faqs.question: Will this generator curse me?
faqs.answer: Definitely not! We only deal in good vibes and creative inspiration here. No curses, hexes, or bad luck guaranteed (or intended!).

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: No problem! Just keep generating! Or, use the prefixes and suffixes as inspiration to create your own unique name. The possibilities are endless!

faqs.question: Can I contribute prefixes or suffixes to the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way and we might just add them to the mix. Let's make this generator even more magical together!
